name: Flipism
description:
Made for GM48 #35

Make sure to click the help button in game!!!

F4 to fullscreen!!!

Flippism is an arcade shoot-em-up where you shoot enemies and flip coins to increase your score. Show me your high score!

I spent a few hours on a project but I didn't like it so I gave up...

THEN I made this instead!

Special thanks to:

illdie - Moral Support

SmollSavage - Playtesting and feedback
